meanings.definition: Sealed tightly to prevent the escape of oil.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic made sure the oiltight seal was secure to avoid any leaks.
meanings.sent2: The oiltight lid on the container kept the oil safely inside.
meanings.sent3: The oiltight door was so secure that even a sneaky oil drop couldn't escape!
meanings.sent4: Her plan was as oiltight as a sealed oil drum, leaving no room for error.
meanings.sent5: The oiltight barrier held back the oil like a strong fortress.

meanings.definition: A material or container that is resistant to the penetration of oil.
meanings.sent1: The oiltight material used in the construction of the tank prevented any oil from seeping through.
meanings.sent2: The oiltight container was essential for storing the oil without any leaks.
meanings.sent3: The oiltight bucket was like a superhero, protecting the oil from escaping!
meanings.sent4: The oiltight barrier stood strong against the oil, like a shield in battle.
meanings.sent5: The oiltight tank was a reliable guardian, keeping the oil safe within its walls.
